George Harms

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Henry and Mary Ellen Smith
  3. Location of Family: Atkinson, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1916
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: In the 1930 census, George is listed as "boy taken to raise" and "boarder." Although it also says he was born in Nebraska, this is not uncommon among the orphans.
  10. Source: 1930 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex
